languages.text: "Знакомый меч. Меня дважды пытались убить его осколками — и напрасно".
"I know that sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."
languages.original_text: "Знакомый меч. Меня дважды пытались убить его осколками — и напрасно".

traits.locale_text: "That is a familiar sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."
"That is a familiar sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."
"That is a familiar sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."
"That is a familiar sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."
"I know that sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."
"I know that sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."

languages.text: “我见过这把刀。曾有人两次拿着它的碎片，打算要我的命，但恕我直言，一次都没有成功。”
languages.original_text: "I know that sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."

traits.locale_text: “这把刀看起来还真眼熟。曾有人两次拿着它的碎片，打算要我的命，但恕我直言，一次都没有成功。”

languages.text: « Je reconnais cette épée. Ses éclats ont servi par deux fois à attenter à ma vie. En vain, bien évidemment. »
languages.original_text: "I know that sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."

traits.locale_text: « Je reconnais cette épée. Ses éclats ont servi par deux fois à attenter à ma vie. En vain, bien évidemment. »

languages.text: 「見慣れた剣だ。その破片は、私の命が狙われたときに二度使われた。いずれも失敗に終わったがな」
languages.original_text: "I know that sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."

traits.locale_text: 「見慣れた剣だ。その破片は、私の命が狙われたときに二度使われた。いずれも失敗に終わったがな」

languages.text: «Reconozco esa espada. Sus fragmentos se han usado dos veces para intentar matarme. Ambos han fracasado».
languages.original_text: "I know that sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."

traits.locale_text: «Reconozco esa espada. Sus fragmentos se han usado dos veces para intentar matarme. Ambos han fracasado».

languages.text: "Ich kenne dieses Schwert. Zweimal wurde mit seinen Splittern versucht, mich zu töten. Zweimal ist das nicht gelungen."
languages.original_text: "I know that sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."

traits.locale_text: "Das Schwert ist mir bekannt. Zweimal wurde mit seinen Splittern versucht, mich zu töten. Zweimal ist das nicht gelungen."

languages.text: "Bu kılıcı tanıyorum. Kırıkları kullanılarak canıma kastedilmişti. Hem de iki kere. Başarısızlıkla sonuçlandıklarını da belirtmeliyim."
languages.original_text: "I know that sword. Its shards were used in two attempts on my life. Unsuccessful attempts, might I add."
